Node.definition: = particle linking two elements and indicating that X takes place after Y has ceased existing or has been completed
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= man, better known as Artaxerxes I; ◄ son of Ahasuerus (אֲחַשְׁוֵרֹושׁ) (Xerxes I); ► king of Persia (פָּרַס) time of Ezra (עֶזְרָא) and Nehemiah (נְחֶמְיָה)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= a nation and its territory, which was greatly expanded during the reign of Cyrus (כֹּורֶשׁ) I.
= man; ◄ son of Seraiah (שְׂרָיָה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) and scribe (סֹפֵר) after exile
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Azariah (עֲזַרְיָה) ► high priest (כֹּהֵן) time of king Zedekiah (צִדְקִיָּהוּ)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Hilkiah (חִלְקִיָּה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Shallum (שַׁלּוּם) ► high priest (כֹּהֵן) time of king Hezekiah (חִזְקִיָּהוּ)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Zadok (צָדֹוק) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► high priest (כֹּהֵן)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man; ◄ son of Ahitub (אֲחִיטוּב) descendent of Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► father of Ahimaaz (אֲחִימַעַץ) became high priest (כֹּהֵן) under David (דָּוִד) and Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) with the prophet (נָבִיא) Nathan (נָתָן) anointed Solomon as David (דָּוִד)'s successor; officer in charge of his tribe
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Amariah (אֲמַרְיָה) high priest (כֹּהֵן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Meraioth (מְרָיֹות) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► high priest (כֹּהֵן)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Meraioth (מְרָיֹות) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► priest (כֹּהֵן)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Zerahiah (זְרַחְיָה) ► high priest (כֹּהֵן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Uzzi (עֻזִּי) descendant of Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Bukki (בֻּקִּי) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► high priest (כֹּהֵן)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Abishua (אֲבִישׁוּעַ) ► high priest (כֹּהֵן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Phinehas (פִּינְחָס) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► high priest (כֹּהֵן)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Eleazar (אֶלְעָזָר) high priest (כֹּהֵן) during last phase of exodus; tribe of Levi (לֵוִי)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► high priest (כֹּהֵן)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) brother of Moses (מֹשֶׁה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► first high priest (כֹּהֵן)
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= man; ◄ son of Seraiah (שְׂרָיָה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) and scribe (סֹפֵר) after exile

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= town; ◄ in Mesopotamia (שִׁנְעָר) ► founded by Nimrod (נִמְרֹד) location of tower of Babel; capital of Chaldean (כַּשְׂדִּים) empire
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= a high ranking official, usually learned, who served in the king's court and was responsible for the king's official business ► held some authority in administrative and financial, and perhaps also military matters
literally: swift; hence: = state in which humans have a significant level of proficiency in a certain craft, which enables them to work relatively fast
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
literally: hand; hence: = action by which humans or deities exert strength and power
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= action by which humans communicate with other humans to request a favor for themselves or someone else

= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= a person responsible for guarding the entrance of a town or building
literally, the ones given or the dedicated ones; hence = persons who were responsbile for doing regular tasks in the Temple and for serving the priests
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= man, better known as Artaxerxes I; ◄ son of Ahasuerus (אֲחַשְׁוֵרֹושׁ) (Xerxes I); ► king of Persia (פָּרַס) time of Ezra (עֶזְרָא) and Nehemiah (נְחֶמְיָה)

= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= state in which a countable entity is the fifth in a range
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= state in which a countable entity is the seventh in a range

= state in which a countable entity is the first in a range
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
literally: foundation (of an activity); hence: = the start of a certain activity
= town; ◄ in Mesopotamia (שִׁנְעָר) ► founded by Nimrod (נִמְרֹד) location of tower of Babel; capital of Chaldean (כַּשְׂדִּים) empire

plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others

Node.gloss: to be committed (to someone or something)
Node.definition: literally: to direct (one's) heart
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= action by which humans or deities make an intensive effort to obtain in depth information about a certain object or event

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans or animals intentionally or unintentionally to acquire knowledge, skill, or behavior; usually refers to learning to the point of doing

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= a pattern of behavior required by somebody in authority
literally: a ruling or decision; hence: = a law or ordinance handed down by a ruler or a deity that a particular group of people is expected to obey
= written specimen of a document, used only for royal decrees

with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day
= a marker indicating that an important statement is following and demanding the attention of the listener
= causative action by which humans or deities cause an event to happen ◄ as if it were an object placed in a certain position
= an official statement that obliges people to behave according to its rules or directives

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= person providing counsel to someone in authority
= causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task
= action by which someone carefully focuses his/her eyes on a group of objects in order to locate something specific among them
territory of tribe of Judah
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= a rule or directive made and maintained by someone in authority
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
literally: (having something in one's) hand; hence: = state in which humans are an expert in a certain matter, ◄ as if having it totally mastered
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or inanimate objects to move or be moved from one place to another
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity

with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: to acquire|to obtain|to purchase|to buy|to reclaim
Node.definition: = action by which humans acquire an animate or inanimate object ◄ by means of a financial transaction or in another way
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= large ruminant animal with horns and cloven hoofs, ► domesticated primarily for meat or milk, as a beast of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; a clean animal which can be eaten and sacrificed

= male herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns; ≈ associated with strength and leadership
= young of a sheep, either male or female; ► clean animal, and allowed for food; also used for sacrifice
= an offering consisting of grain or a grain product, which usually accompanies an animal sacrifice
= action by which humans pour out a liquid, such as wine (יַיִן) oil (שֶׁמֶן) or even blood (דָּם) before a deity ► as a sacrifice
= causative action by which humans cause other humans or animals to move to a location relatively close to the location in focus
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group
= state in which humans or deities consider a matter or an activity morally and/or ethically right
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
literally: to give; hence: = causative action by which humans transfer an object to other humans on a temporary basis

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= an oject that is required

with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
literally: to fall (on someone); hence: = process by which humans are held responsible for a certain action, whether in the past or in the future

= room or place in which valuable items are kept, usually in a temple or palace
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= man, better known as Artaxerxes I; ◄ son of Ahasuerus (אֲחַשְׁוֵרֹושׁ) (Xerxes I); ► king of Persia (פָּרַס) time of Ezra (עֶזְרָא) and Nehemiah (נְחֶמְיָה)

= causative action by which humans or deities cause an event to happen ◄ as if it were an object placed in a certain position
= an official entrusted with the oversight of the funds and treasures of a king
= region on the other side, situated across a stream, or the sea
= large body of flowing water ◄ located in Mesopotamia
= an official statement that obliges people to behave according to its rules or directives

= person ordained and consecrated to perform religious services on behalf of others

= a high ranking official, usually learned, who served in the king's court and was responsible for the king's official business ► held some authority in administrative and financial, and perhaps also military matters
= a rule or directive made and maintained by someone in authority
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day
= state in which an activity is carried out without unnecessary delay
particle marking a phrase indicating a certain quantity; = marker emphasizing that the quantity expressed will not be exceeded
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= weight of approximately 30 kilograms, equals 3000 shekels (שֶׁקֶל) or 60 minas (מָנֶה)
particle marking a phrase indicating a certain quantity; = marker emphasizing that the quantity expressed will not be exceeded
= cereal plant bearing dense four sided spike of grain; ◄ Triticum; ► important source of flour for bread; ≈ its color used to be regarded as the ideal color for the skin
= a unit of both dry and liquid measure of approximately 220 liters; equals 1 homer (חֹמֶר)
particle marking a phrase indicating a certain quantity; = marker emphasizing that the quantity expressed will not be exceeded

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness
particle marking a phrase indicating a certain quantity; = marker emphasizing that the quantity expressed will not be exceeded

= high quality oil, ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness
= white crystalline substance, mainly consisting of sodium chloride; ► normally used for seasoning or preserving food; ≈ associated with infertility of the soil but also with permanence
= a written document, written on an unspecified surface
= an official statement that obliges people to behave according to its rules or directives
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day
= state in which humans are careful and conscientious in their work or duties

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= process by which deities respond with anger to a situation in which humans have disobeyed an order or broken a law
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

Node.gloss: to make known|to show|to inform|to tell|to teach
Node.definition: = causative process by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to acquire information about (other) humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= person ordained and consecrated to perform religious services on behalf of others
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= a professional singer
= a person responsible for guarding the entrance of a town or building
literally, the ones given or the dedicated ones; hence = persons who were responsbile for doing regular tasks in the Temple and for serving the priests

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
exact meaning unsure; probably: = an amount of money that is to be paid to a ruler in return for certain rights or privileges
exact meaning unsure; probably: = an amount of money that is to be paid to a ruler in return for certain rights or privileges
exact meaning unsure; probably: = an amount of money that is to be paid to a ruler in return for certain rights or privileges
literally: to throw (on someone); hence: = causative action by which humans in authority lay an obligation on other humans
= man; ◄ son of Seraiah (שְׂרָיָה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► priest (כֹּהֵן) and scribe (סֹפֵר) after exile
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
literally: (to be in one's) hands; hence: = state in which humans possess a certain quality and have it influence their activities

= a person whose responsibility it is to give a verdict on a case or person in a dispute and ensure that the verdict is implemented, which, ideally, results in vindication for the innocent and punishment for the guilty; this can only be done by someone in authority, such as a judge or ruler or even God himself
= region on the other side, situated across a stream, or the sea
= large body of flowing water ◄ located in Mesopotamia
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= a rule or directive made and maintained by someone in authority
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

Node.gloss: to make known|to show|to inform|to tell|to teach
Node.definition: = causative process by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to acquire information about (other) humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= a rule or directive made and maintained by someone in authority
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= a rule or directive made and maintained by someone in authority
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= state in which an activity is carried out without unnecessary delay

= the act of giving a verdict on a case or person in a dispute and ensure that the verdict is implemented, which, ideally, results in vindication for the innocent and punishment for the guilty; this can only be done by someone in authority, such as a judge or ruler or even God himself
= causative action by which humans are put to death
probably a Persian loanword; = punishment inflicted on the human body
= objects in one's possession that are considered of value
literally: chains; hence: = a state in which humans are confined to a certain location, ◄ as if they are bound with chains

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= indirect male progenitor
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

Node.gloss: to honor|to make glorious|to make great
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities cause humans or objects to have honor, majesty and splendor

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
literally: to stretch out (one's hand and hold out before someone); hence: = causative action by which deities cause good things to happen to humans as an act of kindness

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= a person whose official role and responsibility it is to give advice to someone in authority
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= action by which humans show themselves mentally strong and able to deal with issues relating to good leadership, morals and ethics, politics, danger, and war
literally: hand; hence: = action by which humans or deities exert strength and power
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans or animals to come together as a group for a common purpose

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
